Chapter 5 Interactive component Instructions: The interactive bar chart above shows the proportion of people indicate history of anxiety each year, breaking down by all the categorical variables (therefore excluded age). In general, it seems like people with other health issues shows a higher correlation with history of anxiety. Such conclusion is attained from ignoring the column “Do not know”, since such column usually contains too small of sample size therefore might not be as convincing to indicate a relationship. Please feel free to click on any of the buttons at the top of the graph to explore the proportion break down by a specific group.
